enter_the_email_to_contact: Enter the email where you can be contacted. No one will see this on your profile.
create_password_with_regex: Create a password with at least 6 letters or numbers. It should be something others can't guess
wont_need_enter_info: We'll save the login info for your new account, so you won't need to enter it next time you log in.
use_your_own_birthday: Use your own birthday, even if this account is for a business, a pet or something else. No one will see this unless you choose to share it.
why_provide_birthday: Why do i need to provide my birthday ?
